meanings.sent1: There were a bazillion stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She had a bazillion toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: I have a bazillion things to do, but I'm just sitting here.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered with a bazillion flowers.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a bazillion gold coins.

meanings.sent1: He ate a bazillion cookies at the party.
meanings.sent2: The price of the car was a bazillion dollars.
meanings.sent3: I told him a bazillion times to clean his room.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered a bazillion times louder than before.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter echoed a bazillion times in the empty room.
